title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config & data into a single Modelfile; macOS/Linux/Windows, REST & CLI APIs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers, full chat/generate/embed APIs, streaming support.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; sync & async, chat/generate/embed, streaming, PyPI package kept in lock-step with server releases.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; drop-in LLM & chat model, tool-calling, embeddings, available on PyPI.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat, model manager, multi-user, open-source alternative to ChatGPT UI.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper written in Go; supports chat history, prompt templates, model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilot with autocomplete & explain features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma; ingest PDFs & query via CLI.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run Ollama models inside the editor; supports selection-to-model and chat split.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync & async, streaming, Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust client library for Ollama; strongly typed, async tokio support, crates.io package.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community; use Ollama models as generators & embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Ready-to-use Streamlit chat template that connects to local Ollama; includes session memory & model picker.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes; supports GPU nodes & PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub; one-liner local LLM.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, RAG, fine-tuning & more.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that integrates Ollama for private or channel chat; configurable model & system prompt.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that exposes Ollama endpoints with auth & rate-limiting; plug into any Node API.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter client for Ollama; null-safe, streaming, pub.dev package for mobile/desktop apps.
